issue.title: [CF 46] Checkbox missing in condition editor
issue.body:
When I open the condition editor in beta 8, I can't see the box that must be checked to add a condition.  If I click in the location where the box should be, I eventually manage to hit it and the dropdowns appear.


> Posted by CurseForge user Lokmar | Imported from CurseForge issue #46 | Raw

comments.body:
Are you using the addon 'Skinner'?

Edited Nov 18, 2010

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

How the hell did I manage to delete the condition checkbox template?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
